content.description:
In my opinion this is the best route at rock run. Nice holds and very interesting and cool movement. Video beta: https://vimeo.com/243213836

 Sit start on two not very obvious crimps (see video for clarification) with a pretty good foot. Climb into the stand start and then go out left to a super cool pinch and top as the stand. 

 The first ascent was done by matching the first hold you go to (the better of the two crimps used for the stand start). I did it with some rose move beta that improved the quality for me, but also forces you to stray slightly off route. Both methods seem about the same grade.
content.protection: a couple pads to avoid bailing down the hill

content.description: Starting on solid crimps (one is two fingered) move up to a pinch and then the top out
content.location: Far left of Heavy Petting Zoo's main face; start is a few feet left of Human Pony Girl

content.description: Sit start same as wailing wall sit. Climb into the stand start and then finish as human pony girl. See this video of Wailing wall sit to see the starting position: vimeo.com/243213836

In my opinion the hardest line at rock run. Start with right hand on a very small and sharp crimp, left hand on a barely usable tiny edge. Paste your foot on the slopey, glassy foot and try to pull through to the half decent edge out left. Continue up and right to top at the highest point on the boulder.

 Video of the FA: https://vimeo.com/243213836
content.location: On the petting zoo boulder, to the right of human pony girl.

content.description: Using the same start as Human Pony Girl (under cling and crimp), move up and over to a solid pocket out right then to the top out.
content.location: Same start as Human Pony Girl; main face of the Heavy Petting Zoo Boulder that is facing the Mosquito Boulder

content.description:
Around the corner right of the main face of the Heavy Petting Zoo Boulder (if the main face is roughly East then this would be the North face)is an obvious seam that runs the length of the face; traverse this seam right to left.  

  Slab and usually dirty but fun!
content.location: Heavy Petting Zoo's North face (around the corner right of the main face)

content.description: Start on an under cling and a good crimp, climb straight up.
content.location: Middle of main face, the face facing the Mosquito Boulder.

content.description: A really nice large (relative) block with some quality problems.
